short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Writing assistant that saves you from second-guessing your grammar or wording. It's like having a proofreader in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sagai is a Chrome extension designed to help you write better across the web. It checks your writing and suggests ways to make it clearer and error-free.

How it works:

1. Write like you normally would on any website.
2. Highlight the text you want to improve.
3. Click the extension button and get an improved, error-free version of your text.
4. Copy the suggested text; you can modify it first.
5. Replace your original text with the improved version.

Note: This extension requires an OpenAI API key. The key is stored locally in your browser; we do not have access to it.
